trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderImageMargin%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBorder%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.OnRenderToolStripBackground%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.

The ToolStripRenderEventArgs class also provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripRenderEventArgs 类还提供了数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBackground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripBorder%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawImageMargin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref>类指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>和使用指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref> class for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref>, using the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to paint the specified bounds with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderEventArgs"></xref>类指定<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"> </xref>，使用指定<xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>来绘制具有指定的指定的边界<xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to use for painting.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to paint.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示要绘制的区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>表示要绘制的区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the bounds of the area to be painted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示要绘制的区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that the background of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> is painted with.

Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref>表示之间的重叠区域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> is not a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is `null`, the ConnectedArea property returns an empty <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>不<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>是`null`，ConnectedArea 属性返回一个空<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>.</xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the overlap area between a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示之间的重叠区域<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown"></xref>及其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDown.OwnerItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。
